content: I'd like to know the rules.
Here, I have <style=Highlight>number cards</style> from <style=Highlight>1</style> to <style=Highlight>9</style>. I'll draw one and let you know the number. Then, it'll be your turn to draw.
{A点头}If your <style=Highlight>number card</style> is <style=Highlight>higher than mine</style>, you win.
But if you think the number I drew is too high and your chances of winning are low, you have <style=Highlight>two</style> chances to make me put it back and draw again.
Eyes closed, I'm drawing now!

Let's see... I got <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{NPC选择值}</style> this time!</style>
Your turn, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>!
Eyes closed, prayer done, and time to draw!
I'm good to go!
Also, before you start, I will add a <style=Highlight>Wildcard</style>. If you draw it at any time, you win.
Alright, I'm drawing my number card now. Let's see... I got <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{NPC选择值}</style>!</style> <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, do you want to draw now?
Yes! Let's do it!
I want you to redraw!
Draw another one!

Alright, I'll put it back again.
One last redraw!

Let's see...
{A拍手}What?! It's the <style=Highlight>Wildcard</style>?!
<style=SizeBig>You win! So lucky!</style>
Let's see... {A拍手}You got <style=Highlight>{玩家选择值}</style>, which beats my <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值}</style>! <style=SizeBig>Congratulations, you win!</style>

The rules of this game are a bit complicated.
Do you want me to go over them?
Or do you already know how to play?
I still don't get it. Explain again!
Got it! Let's begin!
Okay, I'll put this back and draw again!

Let's see...
This time, I got <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{NPC选择值}</style>!</style>
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, would you like to draw now?

Let's see...
{A摊手}It's <style=Highlight>{玩家选择值}</style>, which is less than my <style=Highlight>{NPC选择值}</style>...
Sorry, but I win this time.
